languages.text: {n}Гигант мрачно гудит:{/n} "Если бы ты ведал{mf||а}, смертн{mf|ый|ая}, горький вкус злобы Вульфена, ты бы понимал{mf||а}, что скорбь не берет пленных. Скорбь забирает жизни".
{n}Ulfar rumbles grimly,{/n} "Mortal, if you were to know of the bitter taste of Wulfen's malice, you would learn that grief takes no prisoners. Grief claims lives."
languages.original_text: {n}Гигант мрачно гудит:{/n} "Если бы ты ведал{mf||а}, смертн{mf|ый|ая}, горький вкус злобы Вульфена, ты бы понимал{mf||а}, что скорбь не берет пленных. Скорбь забирает жизни".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar rumbles grimly,{/n} "Mortal, were you to know of the bitter taste of Wulfen's malice, you would learn that grief takes no prisoners. Grief claims lives."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar marmonne d'un air sombre :{/n}« {mf|Mortel|Mortelle}, si vous aviez conscience de la noirceur de la malveillance du Wulfen, vous comprendriez que le chagrin ne fait pas de prisonniers. Le chagrin détruit des vies. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar rumbles grimly,{/n} "Mortal, if you were to know of the bitter taste of Wulfen's malice, you would learn that grief takes no prisoners. Grief claims lives."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar marmonne d'un air sombre :{/n}« {mf|Mortel|Mortelle}, si vous aviez conscience de la noirceur de la malveillance du Wulfen, vous comprendriez que le chagrin ne fait pas de prisonniers. Le chagrin détruit des vies. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法发出了低沉而严酷的声音。{/n}“凡人，如果你知道狼人的诅咒有多么苦涩，你就会明白悲伤的野狼从来不抓俘虏，只会收割他们的性命。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar rumbles grimly,{/n} "Mortal, if you were to know of the bitter taste of Wulfen's malice, you would learn that grief takes no prisoners. Grief claims lives."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法发出了低沉而严酷的声音。{/n}“凡人，如果你知道狼人的诅咒有多么苦涩，你就会明白悲伤的野狼从来不抓俘虏，只会收割他们的性命。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは不機嫌そうに言った。{/n}「人間よ、もしお前がウルフェンの悪意の苦い味を知れば、嘆きに貫かれることだろう。命を奪うほどの嘆きに」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar rumbles grimly,{/n} "Mortal, if you were to know of the bitter taste of Wulfen's malice, you would learn that grief takes no prisoners. Grief claims lives."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは不機嫌そうに言った。{/n}「人間よ、もしお前がウルフェンの悪意の苦い味を知れば、嘆きに貫かれることだろう。命を奪うほどの嘆きに」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar brummt grimmig:{/n} "{mf|Sterblicher|Sterbliche}, wenn Ihr den bitteren Geschmack von Wulfens Bosheit kennen würdet, dann wüsstet Ihr, dass Trauer keine Gefangenen macht. Trauer fordert Leben."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar rumbles grimly,{/n} "Mortal, if you were to know of the bitter taste of Wulfen's malice, you would learn that grief takes no prisoners. Grief claims lives."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar brummt grimmig:{/n} "{mf|Sterblicher|Sterbliche}, wenn Ihr den bitteren Geschmack von Wulfens Bosheit kennen würdet, dann wüsstet Ihr, dass Trauer keine Gefangenen macht. Trauer fordert Leben."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar gruñe con expresión sombría.{/n} «Mortal, si conocieras el amargo sabor de la malicia de Wulfen, sabrías que el pesar no hace prisioneros. El pesar se cobra vidas».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar rumbles grimly,{/n} "Mortal, if you were to know of the bitter taste of Wulfen's malice, you would learn that grief takes no prisoners. Grief claims lives."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar gruñe con expresión sombría.{/n} «Mortal, si conocieras el amargo sabor de la malicia de Wulfen, sabrías que el pesar no hace prisioneros. El pesar se cobra vidas».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar ciddiyetle, gümbür gümbür konuşuyor.{/n} "Fâni, Börü garazının acı tadını bilseydin kederin kimseyi sağ bırakmadığını da bilirdin. Keder dediğin can alır."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar rumbles grimly,{/n} "Mortal, if you were to know of the bitter taste of Wulfen's malice, you would learn that grief takes no prisoners. Grief claims lives."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar ciddiyetle, gümbür gümbür konuşuyor.{/n} "Fâni, Börü garezinin acı tadını bilseydin, kederin asla esir almadığını da bilirdin. Keder dediğin can alır."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
